roleset.name: of the liver, gall bladder and bile ducts
roleset.note: HEPATOBILIARY-J NOTES: Added by Julia based on medi-tmprl1to8. (from hepatobiliary.01-j)

example.name: arg1
example.text: Given her history of the hepatic abscess and percutaneous biliary catheter , we will keep watch for signs and symptoms of infection that are hepatobiliary in nature as well and continue her chronic cephalosporin prophylaxis .
